metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7997 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The WPG format reader in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and crash) via vectors related to a ReferenceBlob and a NULL pointer. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7997` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-1').
